title: Icons
body: So I don't know if the Icon hasn't been given out yet or not. but assuming it has because it says it was yesterday. The Pumpkin Icon that was released with doom bots was obtained by sending a gift well the doom bots were going. I did this but never revived the Icon can someone give a quick answer?{{champion:91}}

replies.body:
> *Icons will be granted up to two weeks after November 3, 2016 at 23:59 PT.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016
